entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sackville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:59 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.4°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain or snow near midnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm except 10 cm over higher terrain. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023
